titleStmt.title: A godly sermon preached before the right worshipfull Edvvard Cooke Esquier Atturney Generall vnto the Queens most excellent Maiestie, and others of worship, in Tittleshall in Norfolke: by F.B.
titleStmt.author: Bradley, Francis, fl. 1600.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Felix Kingston, for Thomas Man,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
